name: aDRAWcalypse
description:
"If you love card-based gameplay you will feel both personally attacked and overly catered to." - someone on discord
 "Like 'twitch plays', but all the bad decisions are your fault." - Bill "Just Bill" Williams EVERYTHING IS CONTROLLED BY THE CARDS IN YOUR HAND!

The power is quite literally in your hands!.. and so is your ability to walk, fight, observe objects, and throw a tantrum. 

A JOKE TAKEN TOO FAR NOW 100% PLAYABLE

The mechanics of this game started as a joke on current game design trends, but ended up being more functional than anticipated.

TWO WHOLE LEVELS (WOW)

...And eventually a rougelite mode with random levels as well.
